Books & Magazines
Calendars

Release dates:

2020: 26th November 2019
2021: 12th November 2020
2022: 26th November 2021

These calendars contain art from every phase; they also have album release dates, collaborator birthdays & random historical facts littered throughout.

Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez Artbook

Release date: 23rd October 2020

An artbook included with the vinyl version of Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez (Deluxe Edition) & Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez (Super Deluxe Edition).

Gorillaz Almanac

Release date: 23rd December 2020

This book includes various articles, art, puzzles, a comic & Song Machine, Season One: Strange Timez on CD.

Contents:

Meet Gorillaz
Roadie Reveals All
Noodle’s Slaylists
Comic: Wish You Were Here
How 2D Do You Do?
Doublecross Boulevard
Smash Hitz
The Chronicles of Noodle

The Gorillaz Art Book

Release date: 17th June 2022

This book contains art of the band from several artists, along with a foreword by Murdoc. Two limited edition variant covers were also released, but the content in all three versions is identical.
